pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: その木は空にくっきりと浮かび上がっていた。
lessons.english: The tree was clearly defined against the sky.

lessons.japanese: その山くっきりと青空に浮き出ている。
lessons.english: The mountain is standing out in sharp relief against the blue sky.

lessons.japanese: 青空を背景にその塔がくっきり見えた。
lessons.english: The tower was seen clearly against the blue sky.
